name: Start Snow
description:
The announcement video's thumbnail reveals this game jam's secret hidden theme. Look closer at the cover image.

STARTS     NOW
START     SNOW

You need to activate the snow core to start generating snow. But you are low on people so you have a pretty dumb robot companion you can guide with targets and "5G towers".

AD/<- -> to move
W/^/Space to jump
S/ \/ to dash down
E to pick up or put down objects
Esc/0 to open the pause menu.

This game was made in a little more than 1 day because this game jam was sandwiched between 2 of my holidays but I still wanted to participate.
